html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04012025-03-12TC
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, III, IV and VI to VIII – Air Navigation Services)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, III, IV AND VI TO VIII – AIR NAVIGATION SERVICES) in order to (1) streamline and update terminology to facilitate interpretation of regulatory requirements; (2) eliminate perceived ambiguities and enhance consistency in the interpretation of regulatory requirements; (3) facilitate the adoption and use of innovative technologies; (4) make certain recognized best practices mandatory; (5) facilitate application of procedures in Standard 821 to provide ATC separation; (6) address concerns raised by the SJCSR; and (7) restructure air traffic service provisions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0098 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, III, IV AND VI TO VIII – AIR NAVIGATION SERVICES) in order to (1) streamline and update terminology to facilitate interpretation of regulatory requirements; (2) eliminate perceived ambiguities and enhance consistency in the interpretation of regulatory requirements; (3) facilitate the adoption and use of innovative technologies; (4) make certain recognized best practices mandatory; (5) facilitate application of procedures in Standard 821 to provide ATC separation; (6) address concerns raised by the SJCSR; and (7) restructure air traffic service provisions.
